name: Neon Wings: Air Race (fubenalvo)
description:
I started to create Neon Wings because I had too much free time. At first, I just only made some visual concepts. These looked pretty good and I wanted to fly around in it, so I started to create the basics.
Since then SXtheOne joined the team and made a really good AI and several optimizations. With him, we can finish this game probably this year.  

FOLLOW US!

    

KEY REQUEST FOR CREATORS AND INFLUENCERS
